faq1.question: How can I reset my password?
faq1.answer: Go to the login screen and click on 'Forgot your password?'. Follow the instructions.

faq2.question: How do I update my profile information?
faq2.answer: Go to your profile settings to edit and save changes.

faq3.question: How can I contact support?
faq3.answer: Visit the '$t(menu:helpCenter.support.title)' section in the app to send an email or live chat with our agents.

faq4.question: What if I don't receive the confirmation email?
faq4.answer: Check your spam folder. If it's not there, request a new one from the login screen.

faq5.question: How do I change my email address?
faq5.answer: Go to your profile settings to update your email. Verify the new address.

faq6.question: What should I do if I experience technical issues?
faq6.answer: Restart the app and make sure you have the latest version. If the problem persists, contact support.

faq7.question: How do I delete my account?
faq7.answer: Go to your profile settings and select 'Delete account'. This action is irreversible.

faq8.question: Where can I find the privacy policy and terms of use?
faq8.answer: They are in the 'Information' or 'Terms of use' section of the app.

faq9.question: How is my personal data protected?
faq9.answer: We apply robust security measures. Check our privacy policies for more details.

faq10.question: What should I do if I find a bug?
faq10.answer: Report the bug through the '$t(menu:helpCenter.support.items.bugReporter.title)' section.
